description: This table extracts the payor notification status information.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: MSG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of notification that is sent to the payor.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Inpatient Admission Notification


Advanced Procedure Notification


Inpatient Discharge Notification


Observation Admission Notification


Observation Discharge Notification

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage ID for the notification message sent to the payor

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The payor ID for the notification message sent

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The benefit plan ID for the notification message sent.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: MSG_SENT_DTTM
columns.description: Instant that notification message has been sent in UTC

columns.name: MSG_RECEIVED_DTTM
columns.description: Instant that notification response has been received in UTC

columns.name: MSG_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Notification message status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Sent


Received


Processed


Missing Info


Error


Filtered


Manually Resolved

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: ID of the note that corresponds with the notification message.

columns.name: USER_COMMENT
columns.description: The user-entered text when manually verifying notification status.
